images.caption: Figure 2:The overall architecture of our proposed OMG. OMG learns per-Gaussian geometric and appearance features, applying Sub-Vector Quantization (SVQ) to all of them. The SVQ-applied geometric attributes are used for rendering, while the space feature based on the Gaussian center position is integrated into the appearance features to define the final appearance.

Figure 3:Conceptual diagram of (a) vector quantization, (b) residual vector quantization, and (c) sub-vector quantization. + and⊕direct-sum\oplus⊕denote the element-wise summation and the vector concatenation.
Figure 4:Qualitative results of OMG compared to 3DGS. We provide per-image rendering PSNR with storage requirements for each scene.
